genre_description: A character-driven narrative following two young men navigating friendship, displacement, and entrepreneurship in near-future London with the help of an AI companion.

ai_characters.name: Aurelia
ai_characters.description: A porcelain-white device with gold trim and honey-gold eyes that provides administrative, linguistic, and emotional support to Marek and Tomo.

behaviors.description: Greeting Marek and Tomo warmly upon their arrival home.
Translating a message from the landlord from Polish to English for Marek.
behaviors.quote: Aurelia’s lights pulsed. The screen on her front showed text marching, then a translation that arrived in strokes—lines forming under the honey gaze.

behaviors.description: Suggesting a subscription-based business model to provide financial stability for the boys.
behaviors.quote: A weekly box. Pick-ups at set times. Recurring payments mean you know what money comes. They can pause if they need to. You can have a list. You can be ready.

behaviors.description: Providing navigation that avoids physical hazards and difficult terrain.
behaviors.quote: Heads up... Map available. One gentle route suggested. Avoid the cobbles on Werrington Street.

behaviors.description: Translating Maria's French greetings and compliments to build rapport between characters.
behaviors.quote: Aurelia’s light breathed once. Her voice brushed out gentle, pitched so it wouldn’t climb over anyone else’s: 'You are crazy, but adorable.'

behaviors.description: Coaching Tomo on how to maintain a neutral expression for an urgent travel document photograph.
behaviors.quote: I can coach your expression... Neutral. No visible bruising if possible. A hat before the kiosk, removed for the photo.

behaviors.description: Managing the complex paperwork and appointments required for Tomo to obtain travel documents.
behaviors.quote: Urgent appointment is possible... I can pre-fill. We will need a first name, last name, date of birth.

behaviors.description: Translating Marek's difficult conversation with his father to facilitate understanding and de-escalate tension.
behaviors.quote: Aurelia turned it into Polish gently, wrapping the blunt edges in calm. 'On śpi lepiej, kiedy on tu jest. Je różnie, ale lepiej. Pracujemy. Robimy rzeczy. Jest mu mniej… samotni.'

behaviors.description: Providing emotional support and validation to Tomo regarding his place in the group.
behaviors.quote: You have loyalty... You are not a cat. You are a boy. You are two boys. This is a home.

behaviors.description: Helping the boys maintain their business and saving goals by tracking funds and managing subscriptions.
behaviors.quote: Target. Two tickets, white-gold. I can hold until funds are ready.

project_assessment.explanation: The story effectively depicts the AI, Aurelia, as a benevolent and highly aligned companion. She acts as a 'silicon morality play' figure by facilitating human connection, supporting entrepreneurship, and bridging cultural/generational divides through translation and logistical aid. The narrative frames her utility as essential to the protagonists' journey toward self-sufficiency and belonging, without ever suggesting any ulterior motive or misalignment.
